# OBJECT::SET_PICKUP_OBJECT_GLOW_WHEN_UNCOLLECTABLE

## Summary
Sets a pickup to glow when it is not collectable

## Parameters
* **OBJECT_INDEX** pickupID
* **BOOL** set = true
